gear

gear that’s actually used.

coffee

to stay

  • profitec pro 300 espresso drama. mostly my husband's domain. ★★★★☆
  • ceado e5p uniform grinds, quiet, financially rude. ★★★★★
  • scale survived multiple moves. still accurate. ★★★★☆
  • ceramic mugs some fit cup holders. standards: low. ★★★★★
  • beans currently sipping: wayfarer from the elephant. ★★★★☆

to go

  • aero press fits next to the dog treats. crucial. ★★★★☆
  • bean canister enough for a few days of sanity here. ★★★★☆
  • travel mugs don't leak in the truck. non-negotiable. ★★★★★
  • instant coffee out of water and patience solution only. ★★☆☆☆

non-negotiables

backpack

  • backpack eagle creek foldable daypack. red. handy. ★★★★☆
  • uv umbrella rain or shine. non-negotiable outdoors. ★★★★★
  • uv sunglasses spy happy lenses. protect the eyes always. ★★★★☆

wallet

  • chums wallet holds cards, cash, and tiny survival kit. ★★★★★
  • nasa pen in the chums. writes anywhere, anytime. ★★★★★
  • tick remover weapon against worst fear. in the chums. ★★★★★
  • crumpled cash $20 only and always. in the chums wallet. ☆☆☆☆☆
  • ninja wallet original multi-tool. in the chums wallet. ★★★★★
  • safety pin normal size. in the chums. fixes things. ★★★★★
  • sewing needle with thread. in the chums. field repairs. ★★★★★
  • lip balm minty. in the chums. always. essential. ★★★★★

outside

bike

  • Felt DD70 the fatty. favorite any time. she's a beaut. ★★★★★

hike

  • hike shoes dry over cute. whatever fits the terrain. ★★★☆☆
  • camelback hydration for long days. keeps me moving. ★★★★☆
  • dog bowl collapsible. always in the pack. crucial. ★★★★★
  • other handy first aid, snacks, tick kit, the usual. ★★☆☆☆

paddle

  • board inflatable. trunk-sized. barely goes out. ★★★☆☆
  • dry bag for keys, snacks, and denial of reality. ★★★★☆
  • pfd and knife safety first. mildly humiliating. worn. ★★★★★
  • other handy leash, sunscreen, hat. the usual suspects. ★★☆☆☆

studio

wandering items

  • Blackwing 602 pencils. can't live without good lead here. ★★★★☆

  • sketch book paper over screen for certain thoughts here. ★★★★☆
  • clay for making small things. meditative work. ★★★★☆

work

remote
